basics.description: FinOps workbooks facilitate FinOps tasks that help you build, manage, and optimize cloud resources. [Learn more](https://aka.ms/finops/workbooks)

basics.name: displayNamePrefix
basics.label: Name prefix
basics.toolTip: Prefix to use for each of the workbook names (e.g., 'FinOps-Optimization', 'FinOps-Governance').

constraints.validationMessage: Name prefix cannot be longer than 220 characters.

options.text: Select the FinOps workbooks you would like to include in this deployment. You can select more later.

elements.name: includeOptimization
elements.label: Optimization
elements.toolTip: Select to include the optimization workbook for workload and rate optimization as well as sustainability, security, and more.

elements.name: includeGovernance
elements.label: Governance
elements.toolTip: Select to include the governance workbook for queries to support the Well-Architected Framework governance pillar.
